name: GEVO
description: Advanced biofuels, chemicals and products co.
sampleDescriptions: Supporting fair treatment of Gevo commercial products such as biobutanol in Federal policy-making, including but not limited to comprehensive energy legislation, tax law, agriculture and farm bill, an

Supporting fair treatment of Gevo commercial products such as biobutanol in Federal policy-making, including but not limited to comprehensive energy legislation, tax law, agriculture and farm bill, an
Work to ensure opportunity and access for biobutanol in Federal agriculture programs including farm bill, eg. Sec. Biorefinery Assistance Program.  HR 2, Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018.
Working to ensure the EPA run Renewable Fuels Standard program continues to aid commercial development of biobutanol in the U.S., and removes regulatory barriers.

Working to ensure the EPA Renewable Fuels Standard program continues to aid commercial development of biobutanol as an advanced biofuel in the U.S., and removes various inadvertent regulatory barriers
